surf 3 cyl 0 0 115.5 0 400

pin 1 
fuel1p1r1 0.396
gap      0.416

coolant

pin 2 
fuel2 0.396
gap      0.416
cladding 0.466
coolant

pin 3 
fuel3 0.396
gap      0.416
cladding 0.466
coolant

%-----Pin-Lattice-----

lat 10 6 0.0 0.0 1.3 1

lat 20 6 0.0 0.0 1.3 2

lat 30 6 0.0 0.0 1.3 3


%——Container———



cell outerRing	0 fill 10 2 -1
cell midRing 0 fill 20 3 -2
cell innerRing 0 fill 30 -3
cell boundaryBoxOut	0 outside 	 1

mat fuel1 -10 tmp 900 burn 1 vol 5E+06
8016.09c -6.5e-01 
92235.09c -1.4e-02 
92238.09c -3.36e-01 

mat fuel2 -10 tmp 900 burn 1 vol 5E+06
8016.09c -6.5e-01 
92235.09c -1.4e-02 
92238.09c -3.36e-01 

mat fuel3 -10 tmp 900 burn 1 vol 5E+06
8016.09c -6.5e-01 
92235.09c -1.4e-02 
92238.09c -3.36e-01 

mat gap -0.2692e-2 tmp 900
  2004.09c 1

% zircalloy
mat cladding -6.55000 tmp 90040000.06c  -0.98135  % Mass fraction of natural zirconium24000.50c  -0.00100  % Mass fraction of natural chromium26000.55c  -0.00135  % Mass fraction of natural iron28000.42c  -0.00055  % Mass fraction of natural nickel50000.42c  -0.01450  % Mass fraction of natural tin8016.06c  -0.00125  % Mass fraction of O-16

mat coolant -1 moder lwtr 1001 tmp 500
 1001.03c 2
 8016.03c 1
therm lwtr lwe6.08t    

% --- options:

set ures 1

set dix 1

% --- Group constant generation:

set gcu 0
set nfg 4


% --- Neutrons  -----
% 
%       pts  act inact
set pop 1000 40 20 1 

% --- Cut-offs:

set fpcut   1E-25
set stabcut 1E-12

% --- print depleted materials for static calc

set printm 1

% --- Optimization options.
set opti 1

% --- Options for burnup calculation:

set bumode  2  % CRAM method
set pcc     1  % Predictor-corrector calculation on
set xscalc  2  % Cross sections from spectrum


% total power, W.
set power 3e9
% Burn steps
dep daytot
 270
 500
 1000



% —— plot ——
plot 1 1000 1000
plot 2 1000 1000
plot 3 1000 1000
mesh 1 500 500
mesh 2 500 500
mesh 3 500 500
